Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'Soft light filters through the window, as warm as the gentle aroma of coffee filling the room.'}
{3: "Such a warm afternoon isn't the best time for long meetings. Despite the coffee to help keep you awake, the temptation of drowsiness is difficult to ward off."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: '...Is this really that tiring?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Alright... Let's call it a day! Remember to submit the work reports on time!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She quickly wraps up the last agenda item and claps her hands, releasing a room full of drowsy commandants and staff members.'}
{3: 'As people disperse in small clusters, the meeting room gradually empties. Dust particles dance gleefully in the sunlight, enticing you to just sink down for a delightful afternoon nap.'}
{3: 'You might as well...'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: '"Knock, knock."'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: "Your body instinctively responds to the chair's beckoning, inclining toward it. Just as your eyelids are on the verge of closing, gentle knocks come from the window beside you."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory546.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Ha, caught you slacking off here.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm not slacking off...", 3: '31', 4: 'We just finished a meeting...', 5: '31'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'An explanation is just an excuse, and an excuse is—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Shh, hold on.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With remarkable agility for a technician, she deftly pushes open the window and flips into the room.'}
{2: "What's going—", 3: '39'}
{3: 'Before you can finish your words, another familiar figure emerges on the opposite side of the corridor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'TEDDY!! I saw you!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hiding under the conference table, Teddy gestures at you with her eyes squinted.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Where is she... Huh? Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Did you see Teddy? I swear I saw her run over here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hmm...? Is she inside?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "She's really not here?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina peeks through the window, attempting to get a better view of the room outside.'}
{2: "I didn't see her.", 3: '54', 4: 'We just finished a meeting.', 5: '54'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'This is odd... Could it be a projection that she used to trick me...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "If you see her, make sure to tell me immediately! I'm winning the argument this time, no matter what!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina dashes off energetically in a different direction.'}
{3: 'As the footsteps recede, Teddy cautiously emerges from under the conference table.'}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '68', 4: 'Are you two fighting again?', 5: '68'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "This isn't the time to talk about it. She'll definitely come back...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Covering for your slacking deserves a reward. How about letting me borrow your lounge?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I told you already. I wasn't slacking off—", 3: '73'}
{3: 'Without giving you a chance to protest, Teddy quickly seizes your arm and leads you to Gray Raven lounge.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: 'Gray Raven Lounge'}
{2: "It's a workday afternoon, after all.", 3: '85'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Fair enough. So, can I take a seat here?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct with pink hair gazes at you, seeking permission.'}
{3: 'She settles gracefully onto the couch and summons a virtual screen, poised to delve into her work.'}
{2: 'So, you and Karen—', 3: '93'}
{3: 'Driven by curiosity, you find yourself unable to resist asking after handing her a cup of electrolyte.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Oh, about that... Karenina's dead set on adding a weird structure to the engineering model.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I already warned her that adding that thing could turn the model into a ticking time bomb with even the slightest error.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "But she insisted it'd be fine. I didn't feel like arguing, so I just ran away.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'll just hang out in your lounge to wrap up today's... remaining tasks. You're cool with that, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course.', 3: '103', 4: 'Remaining tasks?', 5: '101'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Yeah, REMAINING TASKS... Life isn't a breeze for the vice-captain of the Engineering Force, you know.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In this tranquil afternoon, the lounge is filled only with the soft tapping of terminal keyboards.'}
{2: '?', 3: '109', 4: 'Is there anything wrong?', 5: '109'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I should expect nothing less. The Gray Raven Commandant is really always under watchful guard, huh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Who in their right mind would set up a stranger signal blocker in a lounge?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...Whatever. I've whitelisted my terminal. My IP will be wiped automatically once I'm done with work.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'What a pain. That set me back a whole twenty minutes of work. Maybe I should charge you for that as well...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Heh, just kidding.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the terminal finally connects to the network, the light gradually dims with the passage of time. After some time, she seems to have completed a phase of her work and starts relaxing.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Is work also this dull for you... even as the Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Meetings, missions, meetings, and report writing...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, pretty much like that.', 3: '125', 4: 'Well, there are still some interesting parts.', 5: '126'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'In that case, you might as well just join the Engineering Force as my assistant and help me with blueprints.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Really...? I don't buy it.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...Did you finish your work?', 3: '128'}
{3: "Seeing Teddy's leisurely grin, you feel compelled to launch a counterattack."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's all done.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Feel free to take a look yourself.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She swivels the terminal screen toward you, revealing a detailed data report of a complete engineering model.'}
{2: 'This... is also part of your work?', 3: '134'}
{3: 'Out of nowhere, a small blue robot materializes on the screen, consuming the text at a fast speed.'}
{3: 'Flustered, Teddy attempts to turn the terminal screen back, but amidst the chaos, the electrolyte spills directly onto the keyboard...'}

{3: 'Both of you watch helplessly as the tiny robot consumes all the data on the screen. Then, menacingly, it loads a sniper rifle, and with a "bang" sound, Teddy\'s terminal screen completely goes dark.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "That was Karenina's engineering model!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'm done for. She's totally going to use this to tease me about slacking off.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'You Gray Raven people are outrageous! Even your whitelist has a defensive countermeasure program!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You find yourself caught in a confusing mix of pride and the urge to apologize.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Sigh, I was hoping to use this to make her shut up...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'So, how are you gonna make it up to me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Do you honestly believe a simple apology can make up for a day's workload for the vice-captain of the Engineering Force?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Shouldn't you... be showing a bit more sincerity?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She bites down heavily on the word "sincerity".'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Tomorrow at this time, meet me at the spaceport.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can react, Teddy has dashed off with the now inactive terminal in her arms.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory546.jpg', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Don't think you can sneak away. I've checked your schedule, and I know you're off tomorrow.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Unnoticed by you, Teddy peers around the door frame at one moment, her eyes squinting.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'll see you there.", 4: '1'}
